### Release Notes
- Version 1.0.2

New Feature: Synchronization of changes made in the new tab across all synced devices.
Bug Fixes: Improved stability and performance with multiple bug fixes.
Upgrade to the latest version for a seamless and consistent experience across all your devices. Enjoy enhanced functionality and a smoother browsing experience with SmartTab.
